PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2009-18502009-11-05,  ,  FIN,  , 
ActInsurance Companies Act
SubjectRegulations Amending and Repealing Certain Regulations Made Under the Insurance Companies Act
PrecisRegulations amending and repealing certain Regulations made under the INSURANCE COMPANIES ACT which received Royal Assent on March 29, 2007, proposed amendments to Part XIII. The amendments were aimed at remedying the uncertainty about the scope of Part XIII and ensuring alignment between Part XIII and the WURA on how vested assets would be distributed in the event of the failure of a foreign insurer that is regulated by the Office of the Superintendent of Financial Institutions (“OSFI”) and allow for a more coherent domestic regulatory environment, to the benefit of policyholders.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2009-0296 Publication Date: 2009-11-25
AttachmentsAttachment
